mapper.select: SELECT A.ORG_STD_ITEM_ID AS orgStdItemId ,B.ORG_STD_ITEM_NAME AS orgStdItemName ,A.ORG_GOOD_VAL AS orgGoodVal ,A.ORG_NORMAL_VAL AS orgNormalVal ,A.ORG_BAD_VAL AS orgBadVal ,img.ORG_GOOD_VAL_FILE1 AS orgGoodValFile1 ,img.ORG_GOOD_VAL_FILE2 AS orgGoodValFile2 ,img.ORG_GOOD_VAL_FILE3 AS orgGoodValFile3 ,img.ORG_GOOD_VAL_FILE4 AS orgGoodValFile4 ,img.ORG_NORMAL_VAL_FILE1 AS orgNormalValFile1 ,img.ORG_NORMAL_VAL_FILE2 AS orgNormalValFile2 ,img.ORG_NORMAL_VAL_FILE3 AS orgNormalValFile3 ,img.ORG_NORMAL_VAL_FILE4 AS orgNormalValFile4 ,img.ORG_BAD_VAL_FILE1 AS orgBadValFile1 ,img.ORG_BAD_VAL_FILE2 AS orgBadValFile2 ,img.ORG_BAD_VAL_FILE3 AS orgBadValFile3 ,img.ORG_BAD_VAL_FILE4 AS orgBadValFile4 FROM PD_ORG_STD AS A LEFT JOIN PD_ORG_STD_ITEM AS B ON A.ORG_STD_ITEM_ID = B.ORG_STD_ITEM_ID LEFT JOIN PD_ORG_STD_IMG AS img ON A.ORG_STD_ITEM_ID = img.ORG_STD_ITEM_ID AND A.STANDARD_ID = img.STANDARD_ID WHERE A.STANDARD_ID = #{filterMap.standardId} ORDER BY A.ORG_STD_ITEM_ID
SELECT A.STANDARD_ID AS standardId FROM PD_STANDARD AS A WHERE A.CLASSESTREE_CODE = #{filterMap.classestreeCode}
SELECT A.ORG_STD_ITEM_ID AS orgStdItemId ,A.ORG_STD_ITEM_NAME AS orgStdItemName FROM PD_ORG_STD_ITEM AS A ORDER BY A.ORG_STD_ITEM_ID
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO PD_ORG_STD ( STANDARD_ID, ORG_STD_ITEM_ID, ORG_GOOD_VAL, ORG_NORMAL_VAL, ORG_BAD_VAL, REMARK, DEL_FLG, CRT_ID, CRT_TIME, UPD_ID, UPD_TIME, ACT_ID, ACT_TIME, VER ) VALUES ( #{standardId}, #{orgStdItemId}, #{orgGoodVal}, #{orgNormalVal}, #{orgBadVal}, null, '0',
#{crtId}, #{crtTime}, #{updId}, #{updTime},
#{actId},
#{actTime},
'1' );
mapper.select: SELECT LEVEL_NAME AS featureNames FROM PD_CLASSESTREE WHERE PARENT_CODE = #{filterMap.classestreeCode} ORDER BY LEVEL_CODE
mapper.update:
UPDATE PD_ORG_STD_IMG SET
ORG_GOOD_VAL_FILE1 = #{orgGoodValFile1},
ORG_GOOD_VAL_FILE2 = #{orgGoodValFile2},
ORG_GOOD_VAL_FILE3 = #{orgGoodValFile3},
ORG_GOOD_VAL_FILE4 = #{orgGoodValFile4},
ORG_NORMAL_VAL_FILE1 = #{orgNormalValFile1},
ORG_NORMAL_VAL_FILE2 = #{orgNormalValFile2},
ORG_NORMAL_VAL_FILE3 = #{orgNormalValFile3},
ORG_NORMAL_VAL_FILE4 = #{orgNormalValFile4},
ORG_BAD_VAL_FILE1 = #{orgBadValFile1},
ORG_BAD_VAL_FILE2 = #{orgBadValFile2},
ORG_BAD_VAL_FILE3 = #{orgBadValFile3},
ORG_BAD_VAL_FILE4 = #{orgBadValFile4},
UPD_ID = #{updId},
UPD_TIME = #{updTime}
,VER = VER+1
WHERE STANDARD_ID = #{standardId} AND ORG_STD_ITEM_ID = #{orgStdItemId}
AND DEL_FLG='0'
